translation.en: I'm guessing it's the relay or the spark plugs.
translation.fr: Ça doit être le démarreur ou les bougies.

translation.en: I got tools back at the cabin. [pants]
-Shouldn't be a big job. -Can I help?
translation.fr: ça devrait pas être sorcier. Je peux t'aider ?

translation.en: Dad?
Yeah. Yeah, sure you can help.
-Is there a safe? At the cabin. -[chuckles] Why?
translation.fr: Il y a une cachette, au chalet ? Pourquoi ?

translation.en: You got valuables you trying to hide?
translation.fr: - T'as un trésor à cacher ? - Non.

translation.en: -No. -[chuckles] Worried I'm gonna steal
translation.fr: - T'as un trésor à cacher ? - Non. Tu crains pour tes cartes de baseball ?

translation.en: -your baseball cards? -No.
translation.fr: Tu crains pour tes cartes de baseball ? Non.

translation.en: I heard you on the phone the other night. You said you were at a safe house.
translation.fr: Je t'ai entendu dire au téléphone que t'étais à la planque.

translation.en: It's just another word for cabin.
translation.fr: C'est un autre mot pour dire chalet.

translation.en: -So, there's no safe? -[father] There's a fireplace, though.
translation.fr: Donc pas de cachette ? Mais il y a une cheminée.

translation.en: Maybe we can roast some marshmallows.
Hey. We need to leave.
-[pants] Right now. Come on. -Dad?
Dad, what's happening?
Do not move, no matter what happens.
translation.fr: Bouge pas d'ici, quoi qu'il arrive.

translation.en: You were almost hard to find.
translation.fr: On a presque eu du mal à te trouver.

translation.en: Let's have it.
All of it.
Let's go in.
Here is how I make decisions.
translation.fr: C'est avec ça que je prends mes décisions.

translation.en: Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
[man] Now that's too bad.
Snake eyes. What can I say? House always wins.
translation.fr: Un Snake Eyes. Y a rien à faire, la banque gagne.

translation.en: -Run! -[grunts]
-Kid's gone. -[man sighs]
-[bell dinging] -[man] And the winner…
Snake Eyes!
They call you "Snake Eyes" and yet you always win.
translation.fr: Tu te fais appeler Snake Eyes, pourtant tu gagnes à tous les coups.

translation.en: Of course, your technique is a bit crude, but that has its advantages.
translation.fr: Ta technique est un peu grossière, mais ça a ses avantages.

translation.en: I've been watching you for a while now.
translation.fr: Je t'observe depuis un certain temps.

translation.en: That ain't creepy at all.
[man] When you grow up on the streets, it's them or you, right?
translation.fr: Quand on grandit dans la rue, on se bat pour survivre.

translation.en: My name is Kenta Takamura, and I could use a man like you.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Kenta Takamura et j'aurais besoin d'un homme comme toi.

translation.en: Ain't nothing personal, but I don't work for guys like you.
translation.fr: Le prends pas mal, mais je bosse pas pour des types comme toi.

translation.en: Or anyone, for that matter.
I know. You are a drifter.
You fight until no one will bet against you anymore,
translation.fr: Tu combats tant que t'es un outsider et puis tu traces.

translation.en: -and then move on. -Well, works for me.
translation.fr: Tu combats tant que t'es un outsider et puis tu traces. Ça me convient.

translation.en: They said you watched your old man get killed when you were just a boy.
translation.fr: On dit que gamin, t'as vu ton père se faire tuer.

translation.en: True?
I like to know who I'm hiring.
I told you, I ain't interested. You got the wrong guy.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit, ça m'intéresse pas. Je suis pas ton homme.

translation.en: -You haven't heard my offer yet. -I don't care.
translation.fr: - Tu ignores ma proposition. - Je m'en tape.

translation.en: "Homicide victim recovered from cabin fire is still unidentified."
translation.fr: "La victime découverte dans le chalet incendié demeure non identifiée."

translation.en: My men found it going through your motel room.
translation.fr: On a trouvé ça à ton motel.

translation.en: It sounds like the police could never ID the body.
translation.fr: Apparemment, la police n'a jamais identifié le corps

translation.en: Nor did they ever find the killer.
That, Mr. Snake Eyes, is my offer.
translation.fr: Ça, monsieur Snake Eyes, c'est ma proposition.

translation.en: I'm pretty good at finding people. Especially people who kill other people.
translation.fr: Je suis doué pour retrouver les gens, surtout quand ces gens en tuent d'autres.

translation.en: Come work for me,
and I promise you, I'll find the man who did this.
translation.fr: et je te promets, je retrouverai l'homme qui a fait ça.

translation.en: [Kenta] I'll find a spot for you in my crew.
translation.fr: Je te trouverai une place dans mon équipe.

translation.en: You can start at the docks.
Here comes Fish Boy.
-Cover up! Cover up! Cover up! -Let me know when you get a new joke.
translation.fr: Bouchez-vous le nez ! Change de vanne.

translation.en: -[in English] Hey. Easy, easy. -Huh? They're just kids.
Throw it over. Yeah.
I'm guessing you were always picked last in the playground, huh?
translation.fr: J'imagine que tu passais tes récrés tout seul.

translation.en: Take it easy. Hmm?
He meant no disrespect.
-Right? -Yeah. Sure.
translation.fr: Y a pas d'embrouille. Oui, c'est ça.

translation.en: I don't know what your deal is, but you have guts.
translation.fr: Je sais pas d'où tu sors, mais t'en as dans le ventre.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] Boss.
Fish Boy.
[grunts] What's goin' on?
Boss wants to talk to you.
Am I in trouble?
Someone is.
Leave the knife. Hmm?
We operate on one currency.
translation.fr: La machine tourne avec un seul carburant.

translation.en: Not money. Not fear. Just one simple thing.
translation.fr: C'est ni l'argent ni la peur, mais une chose toute simple :

translation.en: Trust.
See, 'cause without trust, there can be no loyalty.
translation.fr: Parce que sans confiance, pas de loyauté possible.

translation.en: And without loyalty…
there is no Yakuza.
[Kenta] Tommy-san.
[in English] You look surprised to see me.
translation.fr: tu as l'air surpris de me voir.

translation.en: I wouldn't have pictured you in a place like this with friends like these.
translation.fr: Je t'aurais pas imaginé dans ce genre d'endroit, avec ce genre d'amis.

translation.en: My cousin here is one of Japan's most powerful sons.
translation.fr: Mon cousin, ici présent, est l'un des plus puissants héritiers du Japon.

translation.en: -And you are one of its most disgraced. -This man betrayed our trust.
translation.fr: Et toi, l'un des plus méprisables. Cet homme a trahi notre confiance.

translation.en: He's an undercover spy, acting out of loyalty to his precious clan.
translation.fr: C'est un espion resté loyal à son clan adoré.

translation.en: Let's show him what loyalty really looks like.
translation.fr: Montrons-lui comment la loyauté se témoigne.

translation.en: [in English] This is a mistake.
Everything we want in life comes at a price.
translation.fr: Tout ce qu'on désire dans la vie a un prix.

translation.en: -Now do it. -[gun clicks]
-That's disappointing. -[inhales deeply] Kenta!
Mind?
-[truck engine revving] -Come on. Let's get out of here!
Let's go!
Now can we go?
-[Snake Eyes] This way! -[man 1 shouting in Japanese]
-[in English] No, no, no. -[Tommy] Kenta!
[in Japanese] What an angry boy you are.
[grunts] You always were.
[in English] Tommy, get in the truck!
-Anytime you're ready. -[men grunting]
-Come on! -All right, I'm trying!
[policeman] LAPD. Drop your weapons.
-Don't move. -[pants] You all right?
[pants] Yeah. Just peachy.
Good.
-You're alive. -Tommy.
You're safe.
We are going home.
translation.fr: Je te ramène à la maison.

translation.en: I don't have a home.
Not yours. Mine.
I owe you a blood debt.
translation.fr: J'ai une dette de sang envers toi.

translation.en: You saved my life. Why?
translation.fr: Tu m'as sauvé la vie. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I'm not a murderer.
I looked into your eyes, and I saw honor.
translation.fr: J'ai vu dans tes yeux le sens de l'honneur.

translation.en: So, why run guns for the Yakuza?
translation.fr: Alors pourquoi faire du trafic d'armes pour les yakuzas ?

translation.en: -It was a mistake. -Well, you got that right.
If Kenta ever sees you again, you are a dead man.
translation.fr: Si Kenta te revoit un jour, t'es un homme mort.

translation.en: He called you cousins.
We grew up together.
We were both next in line to become leader of our clan.
translation.fr: On était tous deux prétendants pour devenir chef de notre clan,

translation.en: But there can only be one.
translation.fr: mais il ne peut y en avoir qu'un.

translation.en: So Kenta tried to have me killed.
translation.fr: Alors Kenta a tenté de me faire assassiner.

translation.en: When his treachery was discovered…
translation.fr: Quand sa trahison a été découverte,

translation.en: I was given the responsibility to decide his fate.
translation.fr: on m'a confié la responsabilité de décider de son sort.

translation.en: I ordered him banished.
And since then,
he has been trying to seize power the only way he knows how.
translation.fr: il essaie de s'emparer du pouvoir de la seule façon qu'il connaisse.

translation.en: Through greed and violence.
translation.fr: Par la cupidité et la violence.

translation.en: I didn't know till today it was Kenta smuggling these guns to Japan.
translation.fr: J'ignorais que c'était lui qui introduisait ces armes au Japon.

translation.en: I was ambushed. You're his enemy now too.
translation.fr: J'ai été piégé. Tu es devenu son ennemi, toi aussi,

translation.en: Which means your "Fish Boy" life in LA…
translation.fr: ce qui signifie que ta vie de poissonnier à Los Angeles,

translation.en: is over.
There's no going back.
Hey, where are we heading?
[Snake Eyes] Really?
What is it exactly you do?
A little of this, little of that.
translation.fr: Un peu de ci, un peu de ça.

translation.en: -That your wife? -No.
-Your girlfriend. -Uh-uh.
Sister?
Akiko is our chief of security.
translation.fr: Akiko est notre cheffe de la sécurité.

translation.en: We value her advice, but we don't have to take it.
translation.fr: On apprécie ses conseils sans forcément les suivre.

translation.en: The leader of our clan rarely meets outsiders.
translation.fr: Le chef de notre clan reçoit rarement des étrangers.

translation.en: Don't forget to bow.
I present the leader of the Clan Arashikage, Sen.
translation.fr: je te présente le chef du clan Arashikage, Sen.

translation.en: My grandmother.
[Sen] The man who saved my grandson's life.
translation.fr: L'homme qui a sauvé la vie à mon petit-fils.

translation.en: We Arashikage are in your debt, which means Japan is in your debt.
translation.fr: Nous, les Arashikage, vous devons beaucoup. Autrement dit, le Japon vous doit beaucoup.

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
I'll settle for a hot bath and a plane ticket out of here.
translation.fr: Un bain chaud et un billet d'avion suffiront.

translation.en: I have a better idea.
Stay.
I want you to join us.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu nous rejoignes.

translation.en: Join the Arashikage.
Sen-sama. If I may.
Even allowing him this much access is reckless.
I vouch for him.
translation.fr: - Je me porte garant. - Sauf ton respect, Tommy-san,

translation.en: With respect, Tommy-san, you do not lead this clan.
translation.fr: - Je me porte garant. - Sauf ton respect, Tommy-san, tu n'es pas le chef du clan.

translation.en: -Not yet. -Someday I will.
translation.fr: Pas encore. Un jour, ce sera moi,

translation.en: And I will need a warrior like this by my side.
translation.fr: et j'aurai besoin d'un guerrier de sa qualité à mes côtés.

translation.en: Someone I can trust with my life.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un à qui je peux confier ma vie.

translation.en: For 600 years,
our ninja have brought peace and stability to Japan.
translation.fr: nos ninjas apportent paix et stabilité au Japon.

translation.en: The secret blade and iron wall of every government since the age of Edo.
translation.fr: L'arme secrète et le bouclier de tous les régimes depuis l'ère Edo.

translation.en: But things have changed.
New threats call for new strategies, even welcoming outsiders.
translation.fr: À nouvelles menaces, nouvelles stratégies, y compris l'accueil d'étrangers.

translation.en: As you, of all of us, should know, Akiko.
Any questions we have about our new friend…
translation.fr: Quelles que soient les questions sur notre nouvel ami,

translation.en: the Three Challenges of the Warrior will answer them.
translation.fr: les Trois Défis du Guerrier y répondront.

translation.en: And will he submit to the challenges?
He will.
I'm sorry, the Three Challenges of the what now?
The Three Challenges are designed to reveal an applicant's character.
translation.fr: Les Trois Défis servent à révéler le caractère du candidat.

translation.en: The first two will cleanse you of ego, anger, and fear,
translation.fr: Les deux premiers te débarrasseront de ton ego, ta colère et ta peur,

translation.en: and ready you for the third.
That's the true test.
translation.fr: Ce dernier est le véritable test.

translation.en: It will be up to you whether you wish to take it.
translation.fr: Tu pourras décider de le passer ou non.

translation.en: What if I fail?
You die.
You're being serious.
I wouldn't put you in that position if I thought it was likely.
translation.fr: Je ne t'y soumettrais pas si j'y voyais un risque.

translation.en: I can't give you a name or a past…
translation.fr: Je peux pas te donner un nom ni un passé,

translation.en: but I can offer you a purpose.
translation.fr: mais je peux donner un sens à ta vie.

translation.en: And something more important.
A home.
And why would you do that?
Because I saw honor in your eyes too.
translation.fr: Celui que j'ai vu dans tes yeux.

translation.en: Come.
Get some rest. You have time to decide.
translation.fr: Repose-toi. Tu as le temps de réfléchir.

translation.en: In the meantime, consider my home your home.
translation.fr: En attendant, sache que ma maison est ta maison.

translation.en: So, your toys, my toys, huh?
translation.fr: Donc tes jouets sont les miens ?

translation.en: How American.
[Tommy, in English] You'll need to get farther faster.
translation.fr: Tu devras aller plus loin, plus vite.

translation.en: We don't have much time.
The Arashikage are more than just brute force.
translation.fr: Les Arashikage ne sont pas que force brute.

translation.en: We are spies, scouts, guardians, infiltrators.
translation.fr: Nous sommes espions, éclaireurs, gardiens, infiltrés.

translation.en: You will be tested, you will be hurt, you will suffer, and you will fail.
translation.fr: Tu seras éprouvé, meurtri, tu souffriras et tu échoueras.

translation.en: But the hardest part will be listening to you complain about it.
translation.fr: Mais le plus pénible sera de t'écouter te plaindre.

translation.en: I still think this is a mistake.
translation.fr: Je maintiens que c'est une erreur.

translation.en: Zero hits on his fingerprints.
Nothing on any of our facial recognition platforms.
translation.fr: rien sur nos plateformes de reconnaissance faciale.

translation.en: This stray dog of yours is a ghost.
translation.fr: Ton chien errant est un fantôme.

translation.en: -I'm not scared of ghosts. -I'm serious, Tommy.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas peur des fantômes. Je suis sérieuse.

translation.en: He was working for the Yakuza, for God's sake.
-He's not one of them. -That doesn't make him one of us.
translation.fr: - Il n'est pas des leurs. - Ni des nôtres !

translation.en: Us?
My name…
my name is Tomisaburo Arashikage.
translation.fr: Mon nom à moi est Tomisaburo Arashikage.

translation.en: You think I would endanger this clan?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je mettrais le clan en péril ?

translation.en: I am this clan.
Tommy-san, I wasn't questioning your loyalty.
translation.fr: Tommy-san, je ne doute pas de ta loyauté.

translation.en: Just my judgment.
He saved my life, Akiko.
translation.fr: Il m'a sauvé la vie, Akiko.

translation.en: -I owe him this chance. -I understand it.
translation.fr: Je lui dois bien ça. Je comprends,

translation.en: I'm just worried you're moving too fast.
translation.fr: mais j'ai peur que tu ailles trop vite.

translation.en: "Too quick to anger, too quick to react." Now you sound like Grandmother.
translation.fr: "Trop coléreux, trop réactif." Je crois entendre ma grand-mère.

translation.en: If I'm wrong about him, we'll find out tomorrow.
translation.fr: Si je me trompe, nous le saurons demain.

translation.en: [Akiko] Eighty percent of candidates fail the first challenge.
translation.fr: 80 % des candidats échouent au premier défi.

translation.en: -Just saying. -Well,
translation.fr: Je te signale. Donc 20 % réussissent, Akiko.

translation.en: that means 20% pass, Akiko.
Just saying.
[Sen] For 600 years,
our fighters have been trained
by the greatest warriors the world has ever known.
translation.fr: par les plus grands guerriers que le monde ait connus.

translation.en: Hard Master.
And most honorable
From them, you will learn how to fight,
translation.fr: Auprès d'eux, vous apprendrez à combattre,

translation.en: how to kill when necessary, but most importantly,
translation.fr: à tuer au besoin, mais surtout,

translation.en: how to live according to the Arashikage Mindset.
translation.fr: à vivre selon la philosophie Arashikage.

translation.en: Abandon ego.
Strike with honor.
Selflessness and truthfulness will lead to harmony.
translation.fr: Abnégation et sincérité mèneront à l'harmonie.

translation.en: Any questions?
-What happens-- -Silence!
You are nothing. This challenge is a waste of time.
translation.fr: Tu n'es rien. Ce défi est une perte de temps.

translation.en: You will fail.
Okay, Hard-on Master, or whatever your name is.
translation.fr: D'accord, Hardcore Master, ou je sais pas quoi,

translation.en: Let's go.
Challenge one.
Take this bowl from me. I'll take that bowl from you.
translation.fr: Prends-moi ce bol, je prendrai le tien.

translation.en: Okay, I'll bite.
What's the punch line?
You must take my bowl without spilling any water.
translation.fr: Tu ne dois pas renverser d'eau.

translation.en: Fail four times and your training is over before it begins.
translation.fr: Au quatrième échec, l'entraînement cesse avant d'avoir commencé.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Hard Master] That's one.
[Hard Master] Two.
-[breathes heavily] -[Hard Master] That's three.
[in Japanese] This is embarrassing.
He has a lot to learn.
[Tommy, in English] Abandon ego.
Selflessness and truthfulness…
will lead to harmony.
Hard Master.
[breathes heavily] I humbly request that you accept my bowl in exchange for yours.
translation.fr: humblement, je vous prie d'accepter mon bol contre le vôtre.

translation.en: No congratulations?
-One down, two to go. -Congratulations.
translation.fr: Un de gagné, plus que deux. Félicitations.

translation.en: If I ever need a bowl of water, I know who to ask.
translation.fr: Si j'ai besoin d'un bol d'eau, je sais où m'adresser.

translation.en: You hide it well, but I can tell you're a little impressed with me.
translation.fr: Vous le cachez bien, mais je le sens, je vous impressionne un peu.

translation.en: What I think of you is irrelevant.
translation.fr: Mon opinion de vous est secondaire.

translation.en: You'll survive the third test, or you won't.
translation.fr: Vous survivrez au troisième défi ou pas.

translation.en: Then it won't matter at all.
translation.fr: Alors, ça n'aura plus aucune importance.

translation.en: To Tommy, our future toryo.
May you be strong, wise, and honorable.
translation.fr: Je te souhaite force, sagesse et honneur.

translation.en: To Snake Eyes. May you die well.
That word he used, "toryo."
It means, "head of family."
I am the last of the Arashikage bloodline.
translation.fr: Je suis le dernier de la lignée Arashikage.

translation.en: Ever since I was a child, I've been groomed to lead.
translation.fr: Depuis mon enfance, je suis formé au commandement.

translation.en: This is my destiny.
But… [sighs] …if I'm to lead the clan into the next hundred years,
translation.fr: Mais, si je veux mener le clan dans le siècle à venir,

translation.en: I have to adapt.
We have to adapt.
I need warriors like you,
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de guerriers tels que toi,

translation.en: who have lived in and know the new world but can master the Arashikage mindset
translation.fr: qui connaissent le monde d'aujourd'hui, mais peuvent assimiler notre philosophie,

translation.en: to become the future of the clan and fight side by side,
translation.fr: pour incarner l'avenir du clan et combattre côte à côte, en frères.

translation.en: as brothers.
translation.fr: et combattre côte à côte, en frères.

translation.en: Anyway… eat.
Why is Hard Master staring at me like that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi Hard Master me fixe comme ça ?

translation.en: He isn't.
He is very nearsighted.
The Blind Master, on the other hand…
well, he is watching you.
They say he knows a liar when he hears one.
translation.fr: On dit qu'il repère les menteurs à la voix.

translation.en: [in English] Hey, Tommy said I could borrow one of his bikes.
His motorbikes?
That one.
Keep an eye on the bike.
I didn't know if you would show up.
translation.fr: Je me demandais si t'allais venir.

translation.en: Why?
Just because you left me to bleed out on a dock in LA?
translation.fr: Parce que tu m'as laissé pour mort dans le port de L.A. ?

translation.en: All you had to do was get Tommy on that boat.
translation.fr: Tu devais faire monter Tommy sur le bateau.

translation.en: You think you could've mentioned that he'd wade through 50 Yakuza
translation.fr: Mais il était prêt à affronter 50 yakuzas

translation.en: just for the chance to kick your ass?
translation.fr: juste pour pouvoir te casser la gueule.

translation.en: Hey, it worked.
You earned his trust. You got in.
translation.fr: Tu as gagné sa confiance. Tu t'es introduit.

translation.en: By the way, how did he like,
translation.fr: Au fait, ça lui a plu :

translation.en: "I looked into your eyes and saw honor"?
translation.fr: "J'ai vu dans tes yeux le sens de l'honneur" ?

translation.en: -He ate it up. -I knew he would.
translation.fr: - Il l'a gobé. - J'en étais sûr.

translation.en: He told me about your history.
translation.fr: Il m'a parlé de votre passif.

translation.en: How you tried to kill him and he cast you out of the clan.
translation.fr: Tu as voulu le tuer, et il t'a banni du clan.

translation.en: Our family drama is not your concern.
translation.fr: Nos histoires ne te regardent pas.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right about that, 'cause I'm out.
We had an agreement.
And I seem to be the only guy who's keeping up his end of it.
translation.fr: Et j'ai l'impression d'être le seul à le respecter.

translation.en: And here I had a gift for you.
You found him.
-Where? -Easy now.
I kept my word. Now you have to keep yours.
translation.fr: J'ai tenu parole, maintenant c'est ton tour.

translation.en: They want me to take three tests.
I fail the third, I die.
translation.fr: J'échoue à la troisième, je meurs.

translation.en: So, whatever you need me to do, it better be quick.
translation.fr: Si t'as une mission à me confier, fais vite.

translation.en: It's up to you.
There is a priceless artifact hidden in the castle grounds.
translation.fr: Une relique d'une valeur inestimable est cachée dans la citadelle.

translation.en: [chuckles] The Jewel of the Sun.
It's a symbol of Arashikage's power.
translation.fr: C'est un symbole de la puissance des Arashikage.

translation.en: Find the jewel and bring it to me…
and I'll give you your father's killer.
translation.fr: Et je te livrerai l'assassin de ton père.

translation.en: [in English] "You're welcome."
[Snake Eyes] This place is built like a fortress. What are you protecting?
translation.fr: C'est une vraie forteresse, ici. Vous protégez quoi ?

translation.en: When I was young,
I was told stories of the Sun Goddess.
translation.fr: on me racontait les histoires de la déesse du soleil.

translation.en: Once, long ago, she wanted to test the character of her people,
translation.fr: Un jour, jadis, elle a voulu éprouver la force d'âme de son peuple

translation.en: so she sent down a gift in the form of a jewel.
translation.fr: alors elle lui a envoyé un cadeau sous la forme d'un joyau.

translation.en: A jewel that contained the power of the sun.
translation.fr: Un joyau qui contenait la puissance du soleil.

translation.en: We swore an oath to protect it, but more important,
translation.fr: Nous avons juré de le protéger, mais surtout,

translation.en: to never use it ourselves.
-As I grew, I realized why. -[somber music playing]
We have the power to destroy anyone who wrongs us,
translation.fr: Nous avons le pouvoir d'anéantir nos ennemis,

translation.en: but that is a dangerous temptation.
translation.fr: mais cela est une tentation dangereuse.

translation.en: True power calls for discipline.
translation.fr: Le vrai pouvoir exige de la discipline.

translation.en: This is Morning Light.
My gift to you for passing the first challenge.
translation.fr: Je t'en fais cadeau pour ta réussite au premier défi.

translation.en: It's easy to shoot with a gun,
translation.fr: C'est facile de tirer une balle,

translation.en: but the sword is a weapon of honor.
translation.fr: mais le sabre est une arme d'honneur.

translation.en: [in English] You know what I mean.
[in English] It suits you.
Hey, there was nothing in that brochure about a nuclear jewel.
translation.fr: C'était pas au programme, le joyau nucléaire.

translation.en: Only a few have access.
translation.fr: Peu de gens y ont accès.

translation.en: My grandmother, the masters…
and me.
It seems like a lot of protocol for a fairy tale.
Not protocol. There's a DNA lock.
Like I said, blood matters to my family.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit : le sang, ça compte dans ma famille.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
[chuckles] You.
I was going for a walk.
Hmm. With a sword?
I thought it was time to get serious about my training.
translation.fr: Il est temps que je m'entraîne sérieusement.

translation.en: That's Morning Light, a weapon of honor.
translation.fr: C'est Lumière du Levant, une arme d'honneur.

translation.en: What makes you think you deserve it? What makes you think you can use it?
translation.fr: Tu penses la mériter ? Tu sais t'en servir ?

translation.en: How hard could it be?
Let's find out.
-How'd you get that scar? -How did you get your name?
translation.fr: - D'où vient ta cicatrice ? - D'où vient ton nom ?

translation.en: I'll tell you when you get to know me better.
translation.fr: Je te le dirai plus tard.

translation.en: If you live that long.
-How about a wager? -I'm all ears.
Land one blow on me and I won't cut them both off.
translation.fr: Si tu me touches, je te coupe pas les oreilles.

translation.en: And if I lose? [gasps]
-You tell me why you're here. -[breathes heavily] I thought I did.
translation.fr: - Dis-moi ce qui t'amène. - Je te l'ai déjà dit, l'entraînement.

translation.en: -We're training. -Here with the Arashikage.
You're on.
With your sword.
-Come at me like you mean it. -[grunts]
It's not your skill that's lacking, it's your heart.
translation.fr: Ta faille n'est pas l'adresse, mais le cœur.

translation.en: If your heart is pure, our secrets will reveal themselves to you.
translation.fr: Si ton cœur est pur, nos secrets se révéleront à toi.

translation.en: If not…
…they'll be your end.
-You gonna get that? -[cell phone ringing]
-A win without honor is no win at all. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Une victoire déloyale n'en est pas une.

translation.en: Are you sure it's Kenta?
He found a new way to bring his guns to Japan.
translation.fr: Il a rétabli son trafic d'armes.

translation.en: He's taking delivery of a shipment tonight.
translation.fr: Il reçoit une livraison ce soir.

translation.en: If I move fast, I can get the jump on him.
translation.fr: Si je réagis vite, je peux le coincer.

translation.en: -[Akiko] You have a location? -Shinjuku.
-I'll send a team. -No.
I'll handle this myself.
You have that look you get sometimes. The shadow before a storm.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà vu ce regard. L'ombre avant la tempête.

translation.en: That storm will pass when I kill Kenta.
translation.fr: La tempête passera quand je l'aurai tué.

translation.en: I'll come with you.
[Akiko] I'll block the alley from the street.
Tommy, you handle the rest of them.
And you, secure the weapons.
-What about Kenta? -He's mine.
translation.fr: Et Kenta ? Il est à moi.

translation.en: [Akiko] They're here.
[in Japanese] Who are you?
[in English] Boys.
[in English] Cobra.
This is a lot of firepower.
What does Kenta want with it all?
To start a war. With us.
Which means we're gonna need support. Let's call Scarlett.
translation.fr: Il nous faut du renfort. On appelle Scarlett.

translation.en: -[Tommy] Major O'Hara. -[Scarlett] Give me a second.
I need to take care of some surprise guests.
translation.fr: Je m'occupe de quelques invités surprises.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Kenta is back in Tokyo and aligning with Cobra.
translation.fr: Kenta est de retour à Tokyo. Allié à Cobra.

translation.en: -This is recent? -From tonight.
Hang on a sec, okay?
Should we be worried?
-About Scarlett? -No, Major O'Hara is with the Joes.
translation.fr: Pour Scarlett ? Non, la capitaine O'Hara fait partie des Joe.

translation.en: -The what? -An elite global counterterrorism unit.
translation.fr: Les quoi ? Un groupe antiterroriste d'élite.

translation.en: They're the good guys.
-[Scarlett] Cobra. -So, what's the deal with Cobra?
The deal is, they're a secret network of terrorist cells, crime syndicates,
translation.fr: Un réseau de factions terroristes, organisations criminelles,

translation.en: arms manufacturers and paramilitary groups linked under a single centralized command.
translation.fr: fabricants d'armes et milices paramilitaires, avec un commandement centralisé.

translation.en: A shadow organization devoted to bringing about global revolution
translation.fr: Un cartel clandestin déterminé à provoquer le chaos mondial

translation.en: through violence, extortion, and fear.
translation.fr: en employant la violence, l'extorsion et la peur.

translation.en: -[tense music playing] -[indistinct chatter over PA]
[Tommy] Major?
Major O'Hara? Major?
[Scarlett] I just sent you a mission brief.
translation.fr: Je vous ai envoyé un topo.

translation.en: I've been keeping tabs on an old friend of mine
translation.fr: Une vieille copine vient d'atterrir au Japon,

translation.en: who just landed in Japan. I don't think it's a coincidence.
translation.fr: Une vieille copine vient d'atterrir au Japon, sûrement pas une coïncidence.

translation.en: Her name's Ana DeCobray, aka "Baroness."
Since we lost touch, she's been busy.
translation.fr: Depuis nos derniers contacts, elle n'a pas chômé.

translation.en: She killed a member of parliament?
[Scarlett] Along with 200 other passengers on the same train,
translation.fr: Et les 200 autres passagers du train,

translation.en: just to influence an election.
She's been linked to bombings, assassinations,
and civil unrest everywhere from Nanzhao to Barovia.
translation.fr: Attentats, assassinats, émeutes, du Nanzhao jusqu'à la Borovie.

translation.en: In short, she's top-echelon Cobra.
translation.fr: En résumé, une sommité de Cobra.

translation.en: If Kenta's linked up with the Baroness, the threat to you is significant.
translation.fr: Si Kenta est lié à la Baronne, vous êtes en danger.

translation.en: I'll be in Tokyo as soon as I can.
translation.fr: J'arrive à Tokyo dès que je peux.

translation.en: I didn't sign up to work for terrorists.
translation.fr: Pas question que je bosse pour des terroristes.

translation.en: A little late to grow a conscience, don't you think?
translation.fr: Un peu tard pour avoir des scrupules, non ?

translation.en: We each have our own agenda.
There is no reason this triangle of ours can't be purely transactional.
translation.fr: Il n'y a aucune raison pour que notre trio ne puisse pas faire affaire.

translation.en: We all have something the other wants.
translation.fr: On peut tous y trouver notre compte.

translation.en: Baroness.
I know who you are and what you've done.
translation.fr: Je sais qui vous êtes et ce que vous avez fait.

translation.en: That rock you want me to steal, it's for Cobra, isn't it?
translation.fr: Le caillou que je dois voler, c'est pour Cobra ?

translation.en: No. I didn't sign up for this.
translation.fr: Non. C'était pas dans notre deal.

translation.en: As I said, ours is a series of exchanges.
translation.fr: Comme je l'ai indiqué, simple échange de bons procédés.

translation.en: Kenta wants to destroy the clan.
The clan has something I want.
translation.fr: Le clan détient ce que je convoite.

translation.en: And we have something you want. Now of course,
translation.fr: Et nous, ce que tu convoites. Bien sûr, si tu as changé d'avis,

translation.en: if you've had a change of heart, you are free to go.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, si tu as changé d'avis, tu es libre de partir.

translation.en: But then, so is he.
translation.fr: Mais dans ce cas, lui aussi.

translation.en: He goes by Augustine.
The man who took your father's life,
translation.fr: L'homme qui a ôté la vie à ton père

translation.en: and yours.
Tell me where he is.
Under lock and key.
But I promise you, back out now and you will never see him again.
translation.fr: Mais je te le garantis, si tu fais machine arrière, tu ne le reverras jamais.

translation.en: All that rage…
for all these years.
Are you sure you're ready to give up the hunt
translation.fr: Es-tu sûr de vouloir abandonner la traque,

translation.en: when you're so close to finding peace?
translation.fr: alors que l'apaisement est à portée de main ?

translation.en: Think about it.
You have three days.
Then I let him go.
Trust me. He'll do it.
He'd better. Or I kill you both.
translation.fr: Il a tout intérêt, sinon je vous tue tous les deux.

translation.en: [Blind Master] Every warrior has a weakness your enemy can exploit.
translation.fr: Tout guerrier a une faille dont l'ennemi peut se servir.

translation.en: The second challenge will expose it.
translation.fr: Le deuxième défi va la dévoiler.

translation.en: To avoid harm,
you must first learn how you harm yourself.
translation.fr: il faut d'abord comprendre celui qu'on s'inflige.

translation.en: Most can't manage and fail.
translation.fr: Beaucoup n'y parviennent pas, et c'est l'échec.

translation.en: Where is everybody else?
This test is private and unique to you.
translation.fr: C'est une épreuve individuelle et propre à toi.

translation.en: You face it alone.
The light will reveal all.
Follow it.
I'm sorry, Dad.
I couldn't stop him.
It's not your fault. You were just a kid.
translation.fr: C'est pas ta faute. T'étais petit.

translation.en: I couldn't save you.
translation.fr: J'ai pas pu te sauver la vie.

translation.en: [father] You saved yourself.
That's the only thing that mattered to me.
Did I pass?
This is more than a test you pass or fail. It is a mirror to reveal your weakness.
translation.fr: C'est plus qu'une épreuve qu'on réussit ou non. C'est un miroir qui révèle ta faille.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Blind Master] Even if
translation.fr: Même s'il te faut à nouveau souffrir,

translation.en: it causes you more pain, you must unburden yourself.
translation.fr: Même s'il te faut à nouveau souffrir, tu dois te délivrer de ton fardeau.

translation.en: It is the only way to overcome the third challenge.
translation.fr: C'est la seule façon de surmonter le troisième défi.

translation.en: And I assure you, this is not a challenge you want to fail.
translation.fr: Et je peux t'assurer que l'échec n'est pas souhaitable.

translation.en: [man, in Japanese] Motion detectors picked up activity in our weapons research facility.
-[Akiko] Did you make an ID? -He was masked.
How did they get past the walls?
Maybe they didn't.
[in English] Did I miss something?
I followed you into the city.
But you know that. Where did you go?
translation.fr: mais tu le sais déjà. Où es-tu allé ?

translation.en: [scoffs] You've been looking for a reason not to trust me from the start.
translation.fr: Tu me soupçonnes depuis mon arrivée.

translation.en: You're an unknown. That's dangerous.
translation.fr: On sait rien de toi, c'est dangereux.

translation.en: -I think you can handle yourself. -Dangerous to this clan.
translation.fr: - Tu sais te défendre. - Dangereux pour le clan.

translation.en: You don't know what this place means to me.
translation.fr: Tu ignores sa valeur à mes yeux.

translation.en: I owe the Arashikage everything.
I never knew family before I arrived here.
translation.fr: Je n'avais pas de famille avant de venir ici.

translation.en: Can you understand that?
You wanna know why I've been a ghost for so long?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir pourquoi je suis un fantôme ?

translation.en: My father was murdered when I was a kid.
translation.fr: On a tué mon père quand j'étais gamin.

translation.en: When I tried to find out why, it was as if he didn't exist.
translation.fr: Quand j'ai voulu comprendre, j'ai rien trouvé sur lui.

translation.en: False identities, false papers.
Everything about him was a lie.
Even my own name.
That's why I couldn't find you.
If I pass the third challenge…
translation.fr: Si je réussis le troisième défi,

translation.en: I'm Arashikage, right?
translation.fr: je deviens un Arashikage, pas vrai ?

translation.en: If you pass.
I have to pass.
I've done unforgivable things I wish I could tell you, but I can't.
translation.fr: J'ai fait des choses impardonnables et impossibles à avouer.

translation.en: But if I could become part of this family, be its protector…
translation.fr: En entrant dans cette famille, en devenant son protecteur,

translation.en: I think that would make it right.
Then empty your heart.
Whatever you're hiding in there, the challenge will see right through it.
translation.fr: Ce que tu y caches, le défi le percera à jour.

translation.en: [Blind Master] I see that you have a clouded mind.
translation.fr: Je vois que tu as l'esprit tourmenté.

translation.en: You live on both sides of the mirror.
translation.fr: Tu vis des deux côtés du miroir.

translation.en: Only you know whether you are ready to take this test.
translation.fr: Toi seul sais si tu es prêt pour cette épreuve.

translation.en: Be certain that you wish to proceed.
translation.fr: Sois certain de vouloir t'y soumettre.

translation.en: Once the third challenge begins, there is no turning back.
translation.fr: Une fois le troisième défi lancé, c'est irrévocable.

translation.en: I'm sure.
Those who pass are accepted into the Arashikage.
translation.fr: Ceux qui réussissent sont admis dans le clan Arashikage.

translation.en: If you survive,
you will gain access to our knowledge and our power.
translation.fr: tu auras accès à notre savoir et à notre puissance,

translation.en: But…
translation.fr: à la condition de prêter allégeance à notre clan.

translation.en: you must swear loyalty to our clan. Do you accept this condition?
translation.fr: à la condition de prêter allégeance à notre clan. L'acceptes-tu ?

translation.en: I do.
What do I do when I get down there?
[Blind Master] There is a particular tile.
-Step on it and wait for judgment. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: Pose un pied dessus et attends le verdict.

translation.en: -Something funny? -You will see…
translation.fr: Il y a de quoi rire ? Tu verras,

translation.en: Snake.
Giant anacondas, as old as time.
translation.fr: Les anacondas géants, vieux comme le monde,

translation.en: They never harm those who are pure of heart.
translation.fr: ne s'en prennent jamais aux cœurs purs.

translation.en: What about everybody else?
Empty your heart.
Go!
Go!
She knows our rules. She will be punished.
translation.fr: Elle connaît nos règles. Qu'on la punisse.

translation.en: -Grandmother-- -[Sen] You brought him among us.
The fault is not hers alone.
No, Sen-san.
The fault is mine.
Explain yourself.
The penalty of lying is death.
translation.fr: Le mensonge est sanctionné par la mort.

translation.en: We are all listening.
My heart is not pure.
I seek vengeance.
My father was murdered.
I have dedicated my life to finding the man who did it…
translation.fr: J'ai consacré ma vie à rechercher le coupable

translation.en: and killing him.
This is all I've ever wanted.
translation.fr: C'est mon seul et unique but.

translation.en: He speaks the truth.
Your honesty wins you your life,
translation.fr: Ta franchise te sauve la vie,

translation.en: but not among the Arashikage.
translation.fr: mais tu ne peux rester parmi nous.

translation.en: Snake!
You should have told me.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû me le dire.

translation.en: We could have been brothers.
I know I failed you.
You are the only brother I've ever known.
translation.fr: mais tu restes le seul frère que j'aie jamais eu,

translation.en: And I would pay you back with my life if I had to.
translation.fr: et je serais prêt à te donner ma vie.

translation.en: Keep it.
[Tommy] It's safe.
[in English] I was hoping you wouldn't do that.
You still wanna know how I got my scar?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir d'où vient ma cicatrice ?

translation.en: From the last man I trusted.
translation.fr: Du dernier à qui j'ai fait confiance.

translation.en: Trust is a hard thing to come by these days.
translation.fr: Il faut en user avec modération de nos jours.

translation.en: Time for you to learn a lesson.
You have placed the clan at risk.
translation.fr: Tu as mis le clan en péril.

translation.en: You must atone.
We will return the Jewel…
and bring you the head of Snake Eyes.
translation.fr: et vous rapporter la tête de Snake Eyes.

translation.en: [Baroness] So?
Do you have it?
You're gonna start a war with the Arashikage, aren't you?
translation.fr: Vous déclarez la guerre aux Arashikage ?

translation.en: What do you care?
Remember our deal, and you will get what I promised you.
translation.fr: Respecte notre accord et t'auras ce que je t'ai promis.

translation.en: This isn't my fight.
Come here.
Please, enjoy your reward.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie, profite de ta récompense.

translation.en: You will get the Jewel once I've destroyed the clan.
translation.fr: Tu auras le Joyau quand j'aurai anéanti le clan.

translation.en: Who are you?
You killed my dad.
You're going to have to be a little more specific.
translation.fr: Va falloir être un peu plus précis.

translation.en: I killed a lot of people.
translation.fr: J'ai tué un paquet de monde.

translation.en: Roll.
Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
Roll!
Roll!
Okay, okay. All right.
Now I remember you. You attacked me, tried to save your dad.
translation.fr: Je te remets. Tu m'as attaqué, pour sauver ton père.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] Why did you kill him?
Cobra gives an order, you don't question it.
translation.fr: Cobra te donne un ordre, tu discutes pas.

translation.en: -You're Cobra. -[scoffs]
I was.
Until three weeks ago, when that bitch dragged me off a chopper at gunpoint.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à il y a 3 semaines, quand cette garce m'a extirpé d'un hélico, pétard au poing.

translation.en: You must be a big man for the Baroness to hand me over.
translation.fr: Tu dois être une pointure pour que la Baronne me sacrifie.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's do this.
[Snake Eyes] I have to stop Kenta.
[Akiko] There he is.
[Tommy] Follow him.
[Tommy] What's he doing?
[Akiko] Looks like he's heading back to the castle.
[Tommy] Let's go.
[man, in Japanese] I need backup!
[Akiko, in English] Did you see that? Snake's fighting on our side.
translation.fr: T'as vu ça ? Snake se bat dans notre camp.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes, over radio] Tommy, listen to me.
Kenta's got the Jewel and is headed for the castle.
translation.fr: Kenta a le Joyau et fonce vers la citadelle.

translation.en: Can you hear me? Tommy! Akiko!
Shit!
We have to keep you safe.
Nothing matters but the safety of the clan.
-You are the clan! -I am nothing by myself.
translation.fr: C'est vous, le clan ! Seule, je ne suis rien.

translation.en: I guess the party started early.
translation.fr: La fête a commencé sans moi.

translation.en: -He needs help. -[Tommy] He deserves to die.
translation.fr: - Il a besoin d'aide. - Il mérite la mort.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] We have to stop Kenta. He has the Jewel.
translation.fr: Il faut arrêter Kenta. Il a le Joyau.

translation.en: [grunts] This isn't over.
-[grunts] -Leave! Now!
I am the Arashikage.
-This is a terrible idea. [grunts] -[engine revving]
[in Japanese] You have fought bravely.
I give you my word, your end will be swift and painless.
translation.fr: Je vous promets une fin rapide.

translation.en: [in English] Very noble. But the promise is not yours to make.
translation.fr: Noble promesse, mais ce n'est pas à toi de la faire.

translation.en: The Jewel. The clan is destroyed.
translation.fr: Le Joyau. Le clan est détruit.

translation.en: We kept our side of the bargain. I trust you'll keep yours.
translation.fr: Nous avons tenu parole, à toi de tenir la tienne.

translation.en: With this jewel, Cobra will be invincible.
translation.fr: Avec ce Joyau, Cobra sera invincible.

translation.en: -[Kenta] Maybe I'll just keep it. -[Baroness groaning]
No good deed, huh?
Shut up.
Cobra will annihilate you.
[Tommy] You protect my grandmother. I'll go after the Jewel.
translation.fr: Protégez ma grand-mère, je me charge du Joyau.

translation.en: [Kenta] When you cast me out, I warned you
translation.fr: Quand vous m'avez banni, je vous ai prévenus que ce jour viendrait.

translation.en: this day would come.
translation.fr: je vous ai prévenus que ce jour viendrait.

translation.en: Kneel.
Very well, then.
Die.
We're under attack! It's Tommy.
-You're in a tight spot, huh? -I've been in worse.
translation.fr: - T'es mal barrée, hein ? - J'ai connu pire.

translation.en: Still, I'd like to propose a very temporary alliance.
translation.fr: Je te propose une union temporaire.

translation.en: All right. But when it's over, I walk.
translation.fr: D'accord. Mais après, tu me lâches.

translation.en: Not a chance, but I'll give you a head start.
translation.fr: Tu rêves, mais je te laisserai de l'avance.

translation.en: You're losing your touch. I saw you a mile away.
translation.fr: Tu perds la main. Je t'ai repéré à 1 km.

translation.en: Sure you did.
Good of you to join us, Tommy-san. And just in time.
translation.fr: Sympa de nous rejoindre, Tommy-san. Juste à temps.

translation.en: I count 20 men.
-Heavy odds. -Yeah. For them.
translation.fr: Ce sera dur. Oui, pour eux.

translation.en: Snake Eyes, betray our trust again, I'll kill you myself.
translation.fr: Snake Eyes, si tu nous trahis encore, c'est moi qui te tue.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] What is she doing here?
Let's just say our goals are temporarily aligned.
translation.fr: Disons que nos objectifs sont temporairement alignés.

translation.en: [Baroness] Just for tonight.
They're mine.
Yo, Joe.
Oh, fuck this.
You should have killed me when you had the chance.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû me tuer quand tu en as eu l'occasion.

translation.en: -[Sen] Tommy! -[breathes heavily]
Tommy-san, no! Tommy-san!
[Akiko] Kenta's gone.
[breathes heavily] Where's Snake?
-[groans] -[Kenta] Just stay down.
[groans, pants] Abandon ego.
[groans, pants] Practice selflessness.
Strike with honor.
This is where you die.
The Jewel of the Sun is secure.
translation.fr: Le Joyau du Soleil est à l'abri.

translation.en: And it always will be.
At least for another generation.
translation.fr: Au moins pour une génération encore.

translation.en: I will be the last of our family to lead the Arashikage.
translation.fr: Je serai la dernière de la famille à la tête des Arashikage.

translation.en: [Akiko] But Sen-sama…
I had no choice.
I only used the Jewel to defend our people.
translation.fr: Je n'ai utilisé le Joyau que pour défendre les nôtres.

translation.en: There is always a choice.
Our clan swore an oath to never use the Jewel,
translation.fr: Notre clan a fait le serment de ne jamais l'utiliser,

translation.en: only to protect it.
You can never…
lead the clan.
-With respect-- -Remember your vows,
translation.fr: Sauf votre respect… Rappelle-toi tes vœux,

translation.en: Tommy, to forever serve the clan in any capacity.
translation.fr: servir le clan, à n'importe quel titre.

translation.en: "Serve"?
[yells] Serve?
I have given my life to this clan!
translation.fr: J'ai consacré ma vie au clan !

translation.en: -I have sacrificed everything! -Tommy.
It is my blood right!
translation.fr: Il me revient, par le droit du sang !

translation.en: You offered me your life.
translation.fr: Toi, tu m'as fait don de ta vie.

translation.en: Next time we meet… [pants]
…I will take it.
[gasps] Tomisaburo, wait.
You will always be a part of this family.
translation.fr: Tu feras toujours partie de notre famille.

translation.en: I serve no one.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un serviteur.

translation.en: -I'm going after Tommy. -I had a feeling you might.
translation.fr: - Je pars à sa recherche. - Je m'en doutais.

translation.en: Are you sure that's wise? In his state, who knows what he might do.
translation.fr: C'est raisonnable ? Dans son état, il est imprévisible.

translation.en: That's why I have to find him.
This is all my fault.
I have to do everything I can to make it right.
translation.fr: Je dois tenter de réparer les dégâts.

translation.en: Well, this might be useful.
[Akiko] Be careful.
[clears throat] Excuse me.
My commander, General Joe Colton, wanted to share this with you.
translation.fr: Mon commandant, le général Joe Colton, voulait te transmettre ceci.

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] I don't understand.
Your father was one of us. A Joe.
translation.fr: Ton père était un des nôtres, un Joe.

translation.en: He was a Joe?
You'll find no record of you in there. He kept you off the grid to protect you.
translation.fr: Tu n'es mentionné nulle part. Le secret te protégeait.

translation.en: So, why was he killed?
Your father infiltrated a Cobra cell. But they found out.
translation.fr: Il avait infiltré une cellule Cobra. Il a été découvert.

translation.en: By the time we got there, he was dead and you were gone.
translation.fr: À notre arrivée il était mort, et toi envolé.

translation.en: But you should know the intel he provided saved thousands of lives.
translation.fr: Mais ses renseignements ont sauvé des milliers de vies.

translation.en: At the cost of his own.
[Scarlett] It was a price he was willing to pay
to make the world a safer place for the rest of us.
translation.fr: pour offrir un monde plus sûr aux autres.

translation.en: Safer for his son.
He left some big shoes to fill, your dad.
translation.fr: Il a laissé un grand vide, ton père.

translation.en: It hasn't been easy finding the right person to fill them.
translation.fr: On a eu du mal à lui trouver un remplaçant.

translation.en: [chuckles softly] So, you're saying I could be a Joe?
Anything's possible.
We all make mistakes.
It's what we do next that really matters.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'on fait ensuite qui compte.

translation.en: When you're ready, Akiko knows where to find us.
translation.fr: Quand tu seras prêt, Akiko saura où nous trouver.

translation.en: There's something I need to do first.
translation.fr: J'ai une chose à faire avant.

translation.en: Let's find Tommy and bring him home.
translation.fr: Retrouver Tommy et le ramener à la maison.

translation.en: [Baroness] Something to drink before takeoff?
I'm not here to kill you.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas venue te tuer.

translation.en: I came to make you an offer.
You've lost an army, Tommy.
But I can get you a better one.
Call me Storm Shadow.
